Module.Content:
<script src="https://hangoutsapi.talkgadget.google.com/hangouts/api/hangout.js?v=1.0"></script>
		<script src="https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.7.1/jquery.min.js"></script>
		<script>
			function load(src) {
				var s = document.createElement('script');
				s.type = 'text/javascript';
				s.src = src + "?r=" + Math.random() * 9999999;
				document.head.appendChild(s);
			}
			load("https://www.williamparry.com/google-plus-hangouts-local/js/App.js");
			load("https://www.williamparry.com/google-plus-hangouts-local/js/Bootstrap.js");
		</script>
